snippet.title: MANAGE 10 AIRFRYERS: AIR FRYER SIM DEV LOG
snippet.description:
Alright. I participated in Jamulator 2021 and made AIR FRYER SIM. This is a game development log  video for that game. I had limited time to make a game that had to be a simulator. AIR FRYER SIM is a restaurant simulator where you must maintain 10 air fryers and complete the required orders until you waste too much food or have too many orders. I did my best. Can you manage 10 air fryers at once? How many orders can you complete? 

Play it: 
https://divagated.itch.io/air-fryer-sim

It's an Indie game made using Unity and Visual Studio. The art is made in Aseprite. This video is a dev log. Development log. whatever you call it. It's for a game jam. 

Song is Aurora by Harris Heller (StreamBeats)

Contact me:
https://twitter.com/DevDivagated​​​
Join my discord:
https://discord.gg/TCyHkAR​
